name: Naruto: Shippuuden
description: It has been two and a half years since Naruto Uzumaki left Konohagakure, the Hidden Leaf Village, for intense training following events which fueled his desire to be stronger. Now Akatsuki, the mysterious organization of elite rogue ninja, is closing in on their grand plan which may threaten the safety of the entire shinobi world.

name: One Piece
description: Gol D. Roger was known as the 'Pirate King', the strongest and most infamous being to have sailed the Grand Line. The capture and death of Roger by the World Government brought a change throughout the world. His last words before his death revealed the existence of the greatest treasure in the world, One Piece.

name: Attack on Titan
description: Centuries ago, mankind was slaughtered to near extinction by monstrous humanoid creatures called titans, forcing humans to hide in fear behind enormous concentric walls.

name: Monster
description: Dr. Kenzo Tenma, a renowned Japanese brain surgeon working in Germany, is faced with a difficult choice that changes his life forever: save the life of an influential politician or a young boy.

name: Death Note
description: Light Yagami, a high school student, discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name while picturing their face.

name: Violet Evergarden
description: There are words Violet heard on the battlefield, which she cannot forget. These words were given to her by someone she holds dear, more than anyone else. She does not yet know their meaning.A certain point in time, in the continent of Telesis.

name: Sword Art Online
description: In the year 2022, virtual reality has progressed by leaps and bounds, and a massive online role-playing game called Sword Art Online (SAO) is launched.

name: Nanatsu no Taizai
description: The Seven Deadly Sins are a group of knights who are accused of betraying the kingdom of Britannia and are disbanded as a result. However, a princess discovers the truth and seeks their help.

name: Tokyo Ghoul
description: Ken Kaneki, a college student, survives a deadly encounter with Rize Kamishiro, his date who turns out to be a ghoul. Kaneki ends up transforming into a half-ghoul and struggles to live between the worlds of humans and ghouls.

name: Bleach
description: Ichigo Kurosaki, a teenager with the ability to see ghosts, becomes a Soul Reaper and is tasked with protecting the living world from malevolent spirits.

name: Demon Slayer
description: After his family is slaughtered by demons, Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister, Nezuko, who was turned into a demon.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Yuuji Itadori, a high school student, inadvertently becomes the host of a powerful curse known as Ryoumen Sukuna. Yuuji enters the world of sorcery to protect others.

name: Black Clover
description: Asta and Yuno were abandoned at the same church on the same day. Raised together as children, they came to know of the Wizard Kingâ€”a title given to the strongest mage in the kingdomâ€”and promised that they would compete against each other for the position of the next Wizard King. However, as they grew up, the stark difference between them became evident. While Yuno is able to wield magic with amazing power and control, Asta cannot use magic at all and desperately tries to awaken his powers by training physically.

name: Kiseijuu: Sei no Kakuritsu
description: Anime series about a high schooler who is possessed by an alien parasite and must fight other parasites that consume humans

name: Hunter x Hunter (2011)
description: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks for his father who left him when he was younger.

name: My Hero Academia
description: In a world where superpowers, or 'Quirks,' have become the norm, Izuku Midoriya dreams of becoming a hero despite being born without a Quirk.

name: Tokyo Revengers
description: Takemichi Hanagaki travels back in time to save his ex-girlfriend and change the fate of his friends by fighting against gangs in Tokyo.
